title:
How do I find pictures of the Mint Julep Jubilee that you referred to in Sunday\'s paper on Page 3B.  You have one picture of Andrea Weatherford from Atanta.  Would love to see more pictures.



Thank you.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/apps/pbcs.dll/gallery?Avis=WM&Dato=20100501&Kategori=NEWS&Lopenr=501009998&Ref=PH&show=galleries
